content.rendered:
Directed By Rakhil Akkali . Renoy Scaria Jose. Bhanu Kiran. Krishand. Zhinz Shan

Written By Renoy Scaria Jose. Krishand

Stars Ajayaghosh (Valsan). Sreejith Babu (Constable). Sreenath Babu (Murali). Eldose Jacob (Circle inspector). Kalesh Kannattu (Dharmandhan Sreejith). Sajan K. Mathew (Spokesman). Mdr (Kochuramen). Sanoop Padaveedan (Kurukkan). Nikhil Prabhakaran (Plank). Rahul Rajagopal (Joy). Nileen Sandra (Lissy). Geethi Sangeetha (Madhusmitha). Zhinz Shan (Susheelan Vava). Archana Suresh (Spokeswoman)

Language Hindi. Malayalam

Producers Rakhil Akkali . Renoy Scaria Jose. Bhanu Kiran. Krishand. Zhinz Shan

Production 1830 Crew Films. Krishand Films
